response.overview: On September 3rd GCW presents The Art of War live on FITE straight from from Grand Sports Arena in Hoffman Estates, IL. The event features the returning of Alex Shelley and The 2 Ring War Games Match! Check the already announced lineup below:  The 2 Ring Ladder Scramble Match.  Joey Janela (c) vs Gringo Loco vs Mike Bailey vs Tony Deppen vs Cole Radrick vs Drago Kid vs Dante Leon  Tag Team Match  Jordan Oliver & Nick Wayne vs Aussie Open (Kyle Fletcher & Mark Davis)  Alex Shelley vs. Blake Christian  Charli Evans vs Sawyer Wreck  GCW Tag Team Title Five Way War Games Match  The Briscoes (Jay Briscoe & Mark Briscoe) (c) vs Alex Colon & John Wayne Murdoch vs BUSSY (Allie Katch & Effy) vs Los Mazisos (Ciclope & Miedo Extremo) vs The Second Gear Crew (Mance Warner & Matthew Justice)  *lineup subject to change
response.title: GCW: The Art Of War
